benchmark_details.name: ZNO-Eval
benchmark_details.overview: ZNO-Eval is a comprehensive benchmark designed to assess the reasoning capabilities of large language models in the Ukrainian language, based on real exam tasks from Ukraine's standardized educational testing system.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a robust tool in the form of a benchmark dataset designed to assess the reasoning capabilities of large language models in the Ukrainian language.

data.source: Real exam tasks from Ukraine's External Independent Evaluation and National Multi-subject Test.
data.annotation: Manually extracted from existing examination documents.

methodology.calculation: Models were evaluated in a zero-shot prompting manner with specific instructions.
methodology.interpretation: Performance scores provide insights into reasoning capabilities of different language models.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4o achieved the highest overall performance.
